……あれ？ <r=ドリフト>横坑</r>を抜けました、よね……？\n<r=メイン:
...Huh? We made it through the <r-drift> Drift, right...?
There's nothing resembling a <r=main shaft> main shaft...
マップ読み間違えたとか？ いやでも、反応は……: Did I misread the map? No, but the reaction is...
ちゆるが示す先には、大きなコンテナがあった。: Chiyuru points to a large container.
やっぱり。あれは補給用のコンテナだね。<r=メインシャフト>主縦坑</r>を使用: I knew it. That's a supply container. I wonder if it's from back when we used the <r=main shaft> Main Shaft to search for the mace?
そんなに前の……しかし、時間が経ち過ぎているのではなくて？\n物資の備蓄があった:
That was so long ago... But isn't it too late?
Even if we had a stockpile of supplies, I don't know if we'd be able to use them...
確認してみようか。\n%usernameusernameuserna%、ちょっと:
Let's check it out.
%usernameusernameuserna%, can you help me out a little?
俺とちゆるでコンテナの中を検める。: She and I take our time inspecting the container.
……かなり時間は経っているみたいだけど、\n燃料も弾薬も、それに食料も問題なさそ:
...It looks like a lot of time has passed,
Fuel, ammunition, and food don't seem to be a problem.
まさかこんなところに補給物資があるとはな。\n蜘蛛の糸でも見つけた気分だ。:
I didn't think we'd find supplies here.
I feel like I've found a spider thread.
……まさか、白奈さんはこれを見越して……？\nさすがは白奈さんですわ！:
...Could Hakuna-san have anticipated this...?
That's Hakuna-san for you!
意味はよく分かりませんが、なんだか含蓄のある言葉ですわ！: I don't really understand what you're talking about, but it's a very suggestive word!
こいつ、すごい豪運の持ち主だな……: This guy's got a lot of luck...
か、勝手に使ったりして、後で怒られないですか？: A-Are you sure you won't get mad at me later if I use it without permission?
その時は土下座でも何でもして許してもらえばいい。\n今は俺達の命が優先だ。:
When that time comes, I’ll just have to get down on my hands and knees or whatever and be forgiven.
Our lives took priority right now.
%usernameusernameuserna%のそういう割り切りの\nいいとこ:
%usernameusernameuserna% of that kind of divide
I honestly respect your good points...
謝罪については後で考えましょう。\nまずは補給を済ませてしまいますわよ。:
Let's think about the apology later.
Let's finish resupplying first.
ご苦労さん。じゃあ、飯でも食いながら休憩にしよう。\n腹が減っては何とやらと言う:
Good work. Well then, let's take a break while eating.
They say that when you're hungry, you don't know what to do.
こんなところで悠長に休んでて大丈夫なの？: Is it okay for you to be taking a leisurely rest here?
さっき周辺を調べてみたけど、\nここは断崖によって周囲とは完全に隔離されているみ:
I checked the area earlier, but...
It seems this place is completely isolated from the surrounding area by a cliff.
おまけに狭小な空間だから、大型メイズシフターは入ってこれないね。: On top of that, it's a small space, so no large maise shifters can enter.
なら一安心だね。ラミもお腹すいたー。: That's a relief. Rami's hungry too.
あれ？ そういえば白奈さんの姿が見えないですけど……: Huh? Come to think of it, I don't see Shirona-san anywhere...
向こうの方で周囲を警戒しておくと言っていたな。\n飯を届けるついでに様子を見てく:
You said you'd keep an eye on your surroundings over there.
While I'm delivering the food, I'll go check on her.
白奈の機体は七彩達とは少し離れた場所で、\nひとり佇んでいた。:
Hakuna’s aircraft was a short distance away from Shichika and the others
She stood alone.
こんなところにいたのか。ちゃんと飯を食わないとぶっ倒れるぞ。: So this is where you were. If you don't eat properly, you'll collapse.
大丈夫、食べながらやってるから。: Don't worry, I'll do it while I eat.
周りにメイズシフターはいなさそうか？: Doesn't look like there's any maise shifters around?
そうか。悪いな、負担ばかりかけて。: I see. Sorry for putting so much strain on you.
疲れも恐れも、いつか通り過ぎていく霧のようなものよ。: Exhaustion and fear are like the fog that passes by one day.
言っている意味はよく分からないが……\n俺の前では無理をしなくていい。:
I don't really understand what you're saying, but...
You don't have to push yourself in front of me.
お前がクールな仮面の奥でどれだけ必死に頑張っているのか……\n俺はなんとなくだが:
I don't know how hard you're working behind that cool mask...
Somehow, I think I understand.
これでも人間観察力はあるつもりだよ。: Even so, I think I have the ability to observe humans.
わずかな沈黙のあと、\n白奈はぽつりと口を開いた。:
After a brief silence,
Shirona opened her mouth to speak.
白奈さんなら大丈夫って、そう言われる度に……心が軋むの。\nわたしはそんな大した:
Every time I hear her say she'll be fine... my heart creaks.
Even though I'm not that great of a person...
失敗したらどうしようって、怖くて、怖くて……\nでも、それを口に出しちゃったら、:
I was so scared, so scared of what I’d do if I failed...
But if I said that out loud, everything would probably collapse...
本当は、全部何となくでやって偶然いい結果が出せただけなのに……\nそれで持ち上げ:
Honestly, I just happened to get a good result by doing it all by accident...
And then she lifted me up...
みんなが、さすがは白奈さん、って言ってくる度に\n心の中でごめんなさいって思って:
Every time everyone said, “That’s Hakuna-san for you.”
In my heart, I'm sorry.
今まで誰にも言えずにいたのか、\n堰を切るかのように白奈は続ける。:
I don’t know if I’ve been able to tell anyone until now
Shirona continued, as if a dam had burst.
わたし、みんなから期待されすぎるのは、もう嫌……\nこんな苦しい思いをするぐらい:
I don't want everyone to expect too much from me...
If I'm going to suffer like this, I'd rather make a big mistake...
……期待に押しつぶされそうな気持はよく分かる。\n俺も、似たような立場にあるから:
...I know exactly how it feels to be overwhelmed by expectations.
I'm in a similar position, after all.
だが、お前は自分を過小評価しすぎている。\n偶然だって、結果を出し続けたなら立派:
But you underestimate yourself.
Even if it's a coincidence, if you keep producing results, you'll be able to do great things.
こんなの、実力なんかじゃない。: This wasn’t a matter of skill.
いいや、実力だよ。だって、その結果はお前が必死に考えて動いて、\n足掻いて……そ:
No, it’s true strength. After all, the result is that you’re thinking and moving desperately,
After all, it's the result of struggling...and guiding you.
今は、帰るためにお前の力が必要だ。\n苦しいのなら、俺が半分引き受ける……お前の:
Right now, I need your help to go home.
If it hurts, I'll take half of it... I'm going to take responsibility for your decision.
失敗した時は全力で俺のせいにしろ。\nだから……もう少しだけ、俺達のために頑張っ:
If you fail, blame me with everything you've got.
So... Could you do your best for us just a little longer?
ずっと頼られるのが怖かったのに。\n今だけは……あなたに頼られてるのが、ちょっと:
I've always been afraid of being relied on.
Just for now... I'm a little happy that you're relying on me.
もう少しだけ、頑張ってみる。\nだから、わたしも……あなたに頼らせて、%user:
I'll try a little harder.
That's why... I'll rely on you too. %user name, username, user name, %.
もちろんだ。隊長として、ドンと胸を貸してやる！: Of course. As captain, I'll lend you my breasts!
な、何だ！？ 霞光のセンサーが反応している！？\n白奈、戦闘準備だ！:
Wh-What?! The sensors in the haze are reacting?!
Shirona, prepare for battle!
くそっ、こんな時に……: Damn it, at a time like this...
この反応は……メイズシフターか！\nしかも数が多い……小型種がわらわらと近づいて:
This reaction... It's a maise shifter!
And there's so many of them... Small species are slowly approaching!
っ！ 待て、この反応は――上か！？: ! Wait, this reaction—is it up there?!
い、今、お前に倒れられたら、脱出に支障が出る、からな……: I-If you collapse now, it'll be a problem for us to escape...
ごめんなさい、わたしのせいで……: I'm sorry, it's all my fault...
